site.name: Teodor I. - Development
site.title: Teodor I.
site.tagline: I create websites that transform businesses, servers and projects and enhance user experiences. Specializing in XenForo, Wordpress, NamelessMC, Ghost, Tebex and CraftingStore, clients never leave unsatisfied.

services.title: Transforming Ideas into Intelligent Solutions
services.description: I offer a range of specialized services focused on artificial intelligence and modern web development to help businesses innovate and grow.

aiDevelopment.title: XenForo Forums
aiDevelopment.description: Professional XenForo forum setup and customization, delivering fast, secure, and engaging community platforms tailored to your audience

machineLearning.title: Tebex // CraftingStore Stores
machineLearning.description: Fully optimized Tebex webstores for game servers, including custom themes, product setup, and automation for maximum revenue generation

dataAnalysis.title: Discord Server Setups
dataAnalysis.description: Custom Discord server configurations with roles, bots, permissions, and automation to enhance community engagement and management

chatbotDevelopment.title: Full-Stack Development
chatbotDevelopment.description: End-to-end web and mobile solutions built with modern frameworks and best practices

fullStackDevelopment.title: Full-Stack Development
fullStackDevelopment.description: End-to-end web and mobile solutions built with modern frameworks and best practices

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore some of my recent work showcasing a mix of XenForo, Tebex, CraftingStore and Full-Stack websites.

aiContentGenerator.title: The FUT Depot - Full-Stack
aiContentGenerator.description: A powerful full-stack website featuring custom made automated FUT coin selling, Discord server integration and a unique design.
aiContentGenerator.fullDescription: This custom made automated FUT coin selling uses advanced technology models to create an easy and hassle-free coin buying and selling, bringing a completely new era of FUT coin selling to life.

virtualAssistant.title: Primary Roleplay
virtualAssistant.description: A modern looking XenForo forums made for roleplay enthusiasts.
virtualAssistant.fullDescription: This modern looking forum allows users to communicate directly between fellow community members and engage in out-of-the-box roleplay experiences, bringing life to Primary Roleplay and its infrastructure.

predictiveAnalytics.title: RuthlessPvP - Forums
predictiveAnalytics.description: A sleek and professional XenForo forum tailored to the Minecraft PvP community.
predictiveAnalytics.fullDescription: This sleek, modern XenForo-powered forum is purpose-built for the Minecraft PvP (Player vs Player) community, offering a polished user experience, high-performance design, and a range of powerful features.

documentProcessor.title: RuthlessPvP - Portal
documentProcessor.description: A user-friendly and basic, but modern and professional welcome portal page.
documentProcessor.fullDescription: This user-friendly portal page serves as the central hub for your Minecraft PvP server—designed with simplicity, modern design, and easy navigation in mind. It offers players a smooth entry point into your community, while maintaining a professional and immersive first impression.

sentimentAnalysis.title: JackpotMC - Store
sentimentAnalysis.description: A clean looking Tebex store made for a robbers and cops Minecraft server.
sentimentAnalysis.fullDescription: Crates, coins, ranks - you name it. Step into a professionally crafted Tebex store tailored for a high-stakes robbers vs cops Minecraft experience. Designed to reflect the gritty, fast-paced action of your server, this store features a clean layout, custom visuals, and an immersive theme that aligns perfectly with your brand.

recommendationEngine.title: DEAL - Forums
recommendationEngine.description: A OGUsers inspired website made to compete with the world's best trading forums.
recommendationEngine.fullDescription: This website is a next-generation trading forum inspired by the sleek style and high activity of OGUsers—designed to compete head-to-head with the top digital marketplaces and communities across the globe. It blends a clean, dark aesthetic with powerful user tools and a focus on trust, security, and user-driven commerce.

pricing.title: Investment Plans
pricing.description: Transparent pricing options designed to accommodate different project scopes and requirements.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Perfect for small projects and startups

reviews.title: Client Feedback
reviews.description: Hear what clients have to say about their experience working with me.

sarahJohnson.name: tutoree
sarahJohnson.review: Teodor I. delivered an EXCEPTIONAL website that truly exceeded our expectations, showcasing remarkable professionalism. Working with him was a breeze thanks to his quick responsiveness, timely delivery, and proactive communication. Highly recommended!

michaelChen.name: ealwork
michaelChen.review: WOW! Absolutely the best work I have ever had done on Fiverr! Thank you so much for making it easy and efficient, you went above and beyond and the result exceeds my expectations! Full recommend Teodor!

emilyRodriguez.name: wallstreetdebt
emilyRodriguez.review: Delivered well before the time limit. Perfectly personalised the forum the way I want it to be. Highly recommend if you want to develop a quick high quality forum.

davidKim.name: sorchico
davidKim.review: IlIcmaster is a master of his work. He delivered as described and was patient and very cooperative if I asked for something additional. A very kind person and would/will work with again.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Reach out through any of these channels and I'll get back to you promptly.
